entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse Nationally, voters give their governors an average approval rating of 66 percent on their response to the pandemic, while these same voters give Trump just a 44 percent approval rating on his handling of the coronavirus.
